topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55978a576368722b7d00062e#post_55978a576368722b7d00062e
[bq="trashboat"]!https://data.archive.moe/board/co/image/1429/52/1429529152058.png![/bq]
You can tell most about a person by what sort of lies they tell.

If they're telling lies for profit they're more interested in self interest; if a person tells lies to comfort then they're trying to be good but don't know how; if a person tells lies to protect someone then they're obviously trying to protect someone; etc.
